emptyState.title: No Roadmap Yet
emptyState.description: Generate an AI-powered roadmap that understands your project's target audience and creates a strategic feature plan.

header.competitorAnalysisTooltipDescription: Analyzed {{count}} competitors with {{painPoints}} pain points identified
header.addFeatureTooltip: Add a new feature to the roadmap

featureCard.competitorInsightTooltip: This feature addresses competitor pain points

featureDetail.deleteConfirmMessage: This will permanently remove "{{title}}" from your roadmap.

competitorAnalysisDialog.title: Enable Competitor Analysis?
competitorAnalysisDialog.description: Enhance your roadmap with insights from competitor products
competitorAnalysisDialog.feature1: Identifies 3-5 main competitors based on your project type
competitorAnalysisDialog.feature2: Searches app stores, forums, and social media for user feedback and pain points
competitorAnalysisDialog.feature3: Suggests features that address gaps in competitor products
competitorAnalysisDialog.privacyDescription: This feature will perform web searches to gather competitor information. Your project name and type will be used in search queries. No code or sensitive data is shared.
competitorAnalysisDialog.optionalInfo: You can generate a roadmap without competitor analysis if you prefer. The roadmap will still be based on your project structure and best practices.
